snippet: The government approved an emergency measure to allow the Ilva plant to continue its operations, provided the company invests about $3.9 billion to modernize the plant to meet environmental standards.
abstract: Italian government approves emergency measure to allow Ilva steel plant in southern city Taranto to continue its operations, provided company invests about $3.9 billion to modernize plant to meet environmental standards.
